thread.title: Les Halpert
thread.title_full: Lenox Financial Mortgage Corp. reviewed by Les Halpert

author: Les Halpert
title: Les Halpert
text:
Super follow thru, guidence.and advice.
Our situation was high assets, but little income as we are retired. Lenox was able to package a loan with low interest even with our difficult position. And we did not have to generate an income flow to get approved.
Answered questions and provided more detail beyond asked question. Always seemed ready to assist. Accommodated our needs well.
It really is no cost. When it seemed some cost would bee out of pocket day before close, they added funds to 0 out our cost at last minute. Very truthful and professional with lots of integrity. Highly recommend the group.
